content.prompt: Which of the following best explains how Tony Blair’s perspective relates to political beliefs?

choices.label: The United Kingdom should dissolve into four different countries to increase political efficacy.
A strict unitary system in the United Kingdom would improve voter turnout.
Decentralizing governmental power should help the longevity of the United Kingdom’s government.
Conservatives should be the majority party in the Scottish Parliament and Welsh Assembly to increase the representation of the middle class.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how the author's argument or perspective relates to political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
